---
title: <u>Sources</u>
---
The following sources were used in this project...

##    Dataset 1 (dementia_dataset.csv)
The data used in some sections of this project was downloaded from Kaggle. This 
dataset, "Dementia Prediction Dataset" contains data from 150 patients ages 60 through 96.

- https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/shashwatwork/dementia-prediction-dataset


##  Dataset 2 (dementia_patients_health_data.csv)
The other data used in this project was also downloaded from Kaggle. This dataset,
"Dementia Patient Health, Prescriptions ML Dataset" contains data from 1,000 patients
ages 60 through 90.

- https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/kaggler2412/dementia-patient-health-and-prescriptions-dataset/data
